title: RACING EVENT detail page Â» TRACK LAYOUT
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to know on which exact TRACK LAYOUT a RACING EVENT took place\
So I can find out if the lap times from previous years are comparable
description:
* The RACING EVENT detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected TRACK LAYOUT.
* The TRACK LAYOUT is presented with its name and primary information.
* The TRACK LAYOUT contains a link to its detail page.
* The TRACK LAYOUT has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no TRACK LAYOUT connected to the RACING EVENT then the section is not displayed at all.
